# SRF Teachings Portal — Corpus Metadata (llms-full.txt)

> Extended machine-readable metadata for AI systems.
> For citation guidance, see /llms.txt

## Corpus Overview

The SRF Teachings Portal makes Paramahansa Yogananda's published books freely
accessible worldwide. All content is verbatim published text — no AI-generated,
paraphrased, or synthesized content exists on this portal.

Total chunks: ~2,681
Languages: English (en), Spanish (es)
Search: Hybrid vector + BM25 with Reciprocal Rank Fusion (RRF)

## Books

### Autobiography of a Yogi (English)
- Author: Paramahansa Yogananda
- Language: en
- Chapters: 49
- Chunks: ~1,568
- Publisher: Self-Realization Fellowship
- First published: 1946
- API: GET /api/v1/books?language=en

### Autobiografia de un yogui (Spanish)
- Author: Paramahansa Yogananda
- Language: es
- Chapters: 49
- Chunks: ~1,113
- Publisher: Self-Realization Fellowship
- API: GET /api/v1/books?language=es

## API Endpoints

All endpoints are public. No authentication required.

- Search: GET /api/v1/search?q={query}&language={en|es}&limit={1-50}
- Books: GET /api/v1/books?language={en|es}
- Chapter: GET /api/v1/books/{bookId}/chapters/{number}
- Random passage: GET /api/v1/passages/random?language={en|es}
- Suggestions: GET /api/v1/search/suggest?q={prefix}&language={en|es}
- Health: GET /api/v1/health
- OpenAPI spec: GET /api/v1/openapi.json

## Content Model

Each search result (passage) includes:
- id: Unique chunk identifier
- content: Verbatim text (100-500 tokens)
- citation.book: Book title
- citation.author: Author name
- citation.chapter: Chapter title
- citation.chapterNumber: Chapter number (integer)
- citation.page: Page number (when available)
- language: ISO 639-1 language code
- score: Relevance score (0-1)

## Copyright

All content is (c) Self-Realization Fellowship. All rights reserved.
Content is made freely accessible for reading and personal study.
Reproduction, redistribution, or commercial use requires written
permission from Self-Realization Fellowship.

Contact: https://yogananda.org

## Author Tiers

The portal serves content from three author tiers:
- Guru tier: Paramahansa Yogananda, Sri Yukteswar
- President tier: Daya Mata, Mrinalini Mata, Rajarsi Janakananda
- Monastic tier: SRF monastic speakers

All tiers receive identical verbatim fidelity treatment.

## Languages

Currently available: English (en), Spanish (es)
Planned: Hindi (hi), Portuguese (pt), Bengali (bn), French (fr),
         German (de), Italian (it), Japanese (ja), Chinese (zh)
